name: MegaStack
description: Who will be the first to build their stack to the acceptable height? In this Unity built game, Mega Stack is a fast-paced, competitive, building puzzle game.  With multiple modes to choose from you will be able to have a friendly competition with someone in Versus mode, play with a friend in Co-Op mode, or pass all the challenges in Single player mode. The odds are stacked against you! To find out more go to the information page.
